sentences.sContent: Surveys conducted in other countries reported similar findings.
sentences.sCn: 在其他国家进行的调查也报告说有类似的结果。

sentences.sContent: ...The system Medicare developed to rate nursing home quality is of little help to finding a satisfactory place...
...Think of a 3-year-old lost in the pleasures of finding out what he can and cannot sink in the bathtub...
...the world has been finding less oil than it has been using for more than twenty years now...
...but the oil we have been finding is coming from places that are37to reach...
...But finding that food with much of its fat removed is not very appetizing...
...older workers have a much harder time finding another one...
...you're still finding a high return for individuals who are bright and motivated...
...But I’d rather spend my college days finding out how children learn...
...Teens — no surprise — are good at finding ways to get the things they can’t have...

exam.question: By the end of this month, we surely _____ a satisfactory solution to the problem.

answer.explain: 句意： 到本月底， 我们一定能找到一个满意的解决问题的办法。 句子谓语动词的动作find要在将来某一时刻之前完成， 因此需要用将来完成时态。

phrases.pCn: 故障探测，故障寻找；诊断工具

words.tran: 发现者；探测器；（照相机的）[摄] 取景器；（大望远镜上的）[天] 寻星镜

trans.tranOther: the information that someone has discovered as a result of their study, work etc
